subject: Guidelines for payment to DPR consultant for additional work on account restructuring of project.
text: HTdf <cf <THTf gfferar<ut {414 /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Wm Waw7, 4ev 4artt 3r <onurf TATrT4) '47 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 T % HT T National Highways Authority of India UT {Extn = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 W 6, #i2r-10, BTro, 7} facrff-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/218/2007-Admn: 19.05.2009 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL (27/2009) (Decision taken on Technical Division Note No NHAI/Coord/4/2009) Sub: Guidelines for payment to DPR consultant for additional work on account restructuring Of project It has been decided to follow the following guidelines for payment to DPR consultant on account of additional work for restructuring of project: Restructuring, resulting in deletion of some of the provisions of scope of work of the project, shall be considered as part of the assignment of the DPR consultant and no extra cost on this account shall be payable. (it) In cases where restructuring involves major changes in scope of work as well as mode of delivery (from Toll to Annuity), there may be substantial additional work Such additional works shall be examined by the concerned division for payment on file. Additional inputs in terms of man hours required for completion of the additional works shall be determined and the payment be made after approval of the Competent Authority: 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: buxf (S.K.
